description:
It has a bit of a learning curve, but with osnc charts, a touchscreen on my raspberry and my pc, it works perfect.

some things could be a bit more intuitive in the interface.

I've been using openCPN since 2004. It's hands down the best supported, and has the most DIY interfaces of any program I've seen. I use it to operate my radar, AIS, autopilot, GRIB weather, weather fax, and navigation. It connects to my wifi network and displays all of my sailing instrument data. It's my go source for situational awareness
apreciate for this software, it can be helpfull for navigatio software
If you live in the USA Free charts available... Sadly not for the UK.

As far as I can determine, this level does not support oeSENC. At least I can't find a way, after 2 days of searches, to get the plug-in to install on this lower level. The Software Center should be updated with this later and fully supported level of OPENCPN.
Tried to get it to work for a couple of hours, but it never did. Probably needs something obscure to make it work. Good luck finding it.
summary: not great, would not even display the base map

description: OpenCPN is a wonderful chart plotter program. I used it extensively on my laptop and cell phone. I tried this SNAP and I hate it because I have my charts stored on it's own HDD in my system and after hours of trying I couldn't ever get this SNAP to see it becuase it's not built with removable-media plug. I ended up removing this SNAP and installing the PPA. SNAP IS NOT ALWAYS THE ANSWER!
summary: I love OpenCPN but as a SNAP it sucks!

description: ... and it seems to be maintained upstream. This version has some 20 plugins including oesenc availablle from within the application which is what I use being non-US.
Hab noch nicht alle Funktionen gestestet, sieht aber gut aus.
An sich ist das Programm super nur leider funktioniert die aktuelle Version für Ubuntu (20.04.1 LTS) nicht :/

summary: Karten werden nicht angezeigt.. Aber eine "Mann über Bord Warnung"

description: no lo consigo de ninguna de las maneras posibles, ni por lineas de comandos ni por GUIS ni por nada.
summary: version 5.0 no arranca en linux ubuntu 20.04

description: Bonne application de carto marine, dommage que les plugins manquent à la version linux. Intégration grib nickel.
Been using it for years, really llike it. I have a radar ans AIS interface, all works good.
Pas foufifou hein, ca galere pas mal quand meme votre machin la hein

Utilisée depuis des années, cette application remplit parfaitement son rôle.
Elle est reliée au GPS AIS du bord et fonctionne nickel.
J'utilise énormément le calcul de hauteurs d'eau avec un fichier supplémentaire harmonics que l'on trouve facilement sur le web
summary: Application très fiable et très utile
